    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>MELT-04601081.3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Die Ostsee. Küstenformen und Küstenschutz. Arbeitsblatt 3</string>
            <string language="en">The Baltic Sea. Coastal landforms and coast protection. Worksheet 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les formes de relief de mer baltique et la protection 
côtières de côte. Tableau 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os landforms do mar de Báltico e a proteção 
litorais da costa. Folha 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I landforms del Mar Baltico e la protezione 
litoranei del litorale. Foglio di lavoro 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η θάλασσα της Βαλτικής. Παράκτια landforms και
προστασία ακτών. Φύλλο εργασίας 3</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los landforms del mar báltico y la protección 
costeros de la costa. Hoja de trabajo 3</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Eine Zeichnung zeigt den Querschnitt der Küste. Einzutragen sind die entsprechenden Begriffe. Zu erklären und reflektieren sind verschieden Küstenschutzmaßnahmen.</string>
            <string language="en">Schematic showing the cross section of the coast. Fill in the adequate terms. Explain and reflect the different coast protection strategies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Küste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Küstenform</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Ostsee</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Küstenschutz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Düne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coast</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coastal form</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Baltic Sea</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coastal protection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Dune</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Schéma montrant la coupe de la côte. 
Complétez les limites adéquates. Expliquez et reflétez 
les différentes stratégies de protection de côte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama esquemático que mostra a seção 
transversal da costa. Preencha os termos adequados. 
Explique e refleta as estratégias diferentes da proteção da 
costa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema che mostra la sezione trasversale del 
litorale. Riempa i termini sufficienti. Spieghi e rifletta
le strategie differenti di protezione del litorale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχηματική αναπαράσταση που εμφανίζει διαγώνιο τμήμα 
της ακτής. Συμπληρώστε τους επαρκείς όρους. Εξηγήστε 
και απεικονίστε τις διαφορετικές στρατηγικές προστασίας ακτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama esquemático que muestra la sección 
transversal de la costa. Complete los términos adecuados. 
Explique y refleje las diversas estrategias de la protección de
la costa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Côte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forme côtière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mer Baltique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
